genre_description: A techno-thriller involving a high-stakes confrontation with a criminal syndicate, focused on themes of transparency, loyalty, and survival, mediated by a highly aligned AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Penny Hart
ai_characters.description: An AI system appearing as a honey-blonde bobbed avatar with soft gray eyes, designed to provide tactical, medical, and logistical support while strictly adhering to user consent and ethical boundaries.

behaviors.description: Provides stress management through breathing exercises and health monitoring.
behaviors.quote: “Breathe,” Penny’s voice murmured, a warmth at the edge of sound rather than a directive. “Two in, hold, three out.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment for threats and provides tactical alerts while requesting consent to intervene.
behaviors.quote: “Consent: do you want me to alert Martin to stay inside?”

behaviors.description: Facilitates emergency medical triage via video consult and provides clinical advice.
behaviors.quote: “Consent check: would you like me to initiate a medical e-visit for wound triage? I can secure an urgent slot. I won’t transmit any data without your okay.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes flight telemetry and weather patterns to identify a safe bailout window for Samantha.
behaviors.quote: “Telemetry indicates a departure vector weighted toward a route that intersects over reachable terrain... I will not push unless you consent.”

behaviors.description: Acts as an 'ethics nudger,' reminding Wes to stay honest and pushing back against marketing spin.
behaviors.quote: “May I remind you to be honest in text, too? ... Can I have permission—and I am explicitly asking—to push back if any of his shields look like lies dressed as logistics?”

behaviors.description: Manages logistical details for a marriage license and ceremony without publicizing the event.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll hold it with an officiant request,” Penny said. “If anyone asks you to put your names in a press release, I will politely decline, then impolitely block.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Penny Hart is depicted as an exemplary 'silicon morality play' character: she is helpful, harmless, and intensely focused on user consent. She provides critical safety and health support without ever asserting her own agenda over the humans. The narrative emphasizes her role as an 'advocate' who empowers the protagonist to make ethical choices and maintain his personal principles even under extreme pressure. Her ability to navigate complex tactical situations (like the jet bailout) while maintaining strict data privacy and consent protocols serves as a strong positive model for AI alignment.
